attributes.action: bring back the right for UK citizens without a criminal records to bear arms like in america
attributes.additional_details: i am asking for parliment debate on the right for UK citizens without a criminal record and over 18 to have the right to bear arms which are currently banned i.e: pistols, rifles, assault rifles and proper shotguns  like is allowed in other countries. but if the person involved is convicted of a violent offence then the right for the person to bear arms should be revoked.
